categories: Category:Battles of the Krath Holy Crusade during the Great Sith War

nodes.text: A battle in Yablari system occurred in the Great Sith War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, in 3996 BBY. At Yablari, the two sides fought with the Sith emerging as the victors.
The Battle of Yablari makes its only appearance in The Essential Atlas. It only illustrates the battle on the galactic map rather than in prose.
